event.head: Describe the measurement. 2. Pre-processing / selection and annotation of measurement sites on reference images
event.desc: Select the sites of analysis. Use (or Acquire) high resolution detailed images of the entire object and of the part under study as references. Zoom in and acquire high resolution image of the detail under examination. Select the area of measurement and use the detailed reference images to annotate the points of analysis.
